message.E_Start_TmpExist: Temporary file already exists. Delete this data.
message.E_Start_AppendExist: Cannot find the extended configuration file.
message.E_Start_AppendOpen: Cannot open the extended configuration file
message.E_Start_SDK: Cannot read the SDK version in the configuration file.
message.E_LoadRom_Sign: Illegal ROM data. Either this is not TWL-compatible or TWL-exclusive ROM data, or the ROM data may have been modified.
message.E_LoadRom_Platform: This tool is for TWL-compatible ROMs only. Cannot read a ROM that does not support TWL, such as a NTR-only ROM.
message.E_LoadRom_Default: Failed to read ROM data file. Read ROM data again.
message.E_LoadRom_CRC: ROM data CRC calculation failed. ROM data read canceled.
message.E_LoadRom_Exist: Cannot read because the ROM data file does not exist.
message.E_LoadRom_Tad: The reading of the TAD file has failed.
message.E_SaveSet_Empty: ROM data file has not been read.
message.E_SaveSet_Setting: Submission data cannot be created due to illegal settings.
message.E_SaveSet_Input: Submission data cannot be created due to insufficient input information.
message.SaveSet_Name:
The following submission files are all created at one time.
{0} (Master ROM) {1} (Master ROM submission checklist) {2} (List of middleware) {3} (Print version of list of middleware)
message.E_SaveSet_FolderCancel: Submission data is not created because folder selection has been canceled.
message.E_SaveSet_OWCancel: Submission data is not created because file overwrite has been canceled.
message.E_SaveSet_FileDefault: Failed to create Master ROM. Halted during creation, so some files were not created.
message.E_SaveSet_FileOpen: Master ROM file not created due to failure to open the output file.
message.E_SaveSet_FileRead: Master ROM file not created due to failure to read the file.
message.E_SaveSet_FileWrite: Master ROM file not created due to failure to write to the output file.
message.E_SaveSet_FileCopy: Master ROM file not created due to failure to copy the input ROM data file.
message.E_SaveSet_FileExist: Master ROM file not created because the output file cannot be created if the input ROM data file does not exist in the source folder.
message.E_SaveSet_FileSign: Master ROM file not created due to failure to calculate the digital signature of the output file.
message.E_SaveSet_CRC: Failed to calculate CRC. Halted during creation, so some files were not created.
message.E_SaveSet_MWList: Could not create middleware list. Halted during creation, so some files were not created.
message.E_SaveSet_SheetTemplate: Failed to create submission checklist because submission checklist template could not be opened.
message.E_SaveSet_SheetOpen: Could not write data to submission checklist. Check that a file of the same name is not already open.
message.E_SaveRom_Empty: Could not create Master ROM because the ROM data file has not been read.
message.E_SaveRom_Setting: Could not create Master ROM due to illegal settings.
message.SaveRom_Name:
This procedure creates the following files.
{0} (Master ROM)
message.E_SaveRom_FolderCancel: The Master ROM was not created because folder selection has been canceled.
message.E_SaveRom_OWCancel: Creation of Master ROM was canceled.
message.E_MWList_Empty: ROM data file has not been read.
message.E_MWList_Default: Failed to create the middleware list.
message.E_ErrList_Empty: ROM data file has not been read.
message.E_ErrList_Default: Failed to create the error list.
message.E_RomInfoList_Empty: ROM data file has not been read.
message.E_RomInfoList_Default: Failed to create the ROM info list.
message.RomInfoList_Success: Succeeded in creating ROM info list.
message.RatingPendingSelect: {0}: A "Rating Pending" has been specified. Re-submit when examination is finished.
message.RatingUnnecessarySelect: Selected if rating does not need to be shown. This choice can only be selected when the software is a kind of tool and not a game. Contact support@noa.com to determine if the rating does not need to be displayed.
